SHOW7AU.original: ~z~~x~Yes, that's happened to me before. You see, I have cheated death my whole life!
SHOW7AU.translated: ~z~~x~是的，之前我就遇到过这种事。你看，我这辈子都在欺骗死神！

SHOW7AU.original: ~z~~x~You see, lots of people have dreams but they don't do anything about them,
SHOW7AU.translated: ~z~~x~你看，很多人都空有梦想，但不做任何努力。

SHOW7AU.original: ~z~~x~I am Kleinman, magician! Death, prepare to weep!
~z~~x~or if they do they find that being treated like a toilet is not as fun as it sounds.
SHOW7AU.translated: ~z~~x~就算努力，也只会发现被当便器也没听着那么有趣。

SHOW7AU.original: ~z~~x~Laurel, lock me in and do your worst! I am not afraid! Kids, do not try this at home.
SHOW7AU.translated: ~z~~x~Laurel，把我锁进去，下手狠点！我可不怕！孩子们，别在家里模仿！

SHOW7AU.original: ~z~~x~I can make love like a unicorn or fly on a carpet like an ape.
SHOW7AU.translated: ~z~~x~我可以像独角兽一样做爱，也能像猴子一样骑上飞毯。

SHOW7AU.original: ~z~~x~Everybody, please calm down! Don't leave! Wow, is terrible smell of burning person.
SHOW7AU.translated: ~z~~x~各位，请冷静！别走！哇哦，烧人的味道真糟糕。

SHOW7AU.original: ~z~~x~I have stared death in the eyes and licked my lips.
SHOW7AU.translated: ~z~~x~我直视死神的眼睛还舔了舔嘴唇。

SHOW7AU.original: ~z~~x~If you don't try, you can't fail. So, tonight I will crawl into this box and cheat death!
SHOW7AU.translated: ~z~~x~要是你没试过，也就不会失败。所以今晚我将进入这个箱子，欺骗死神！

SHOW7AU.original: ~z~~x~Welcome best magician in Hove Beach, Incredible Kleinman!
SHOW7AU.translated: ~z~~x~欢迎Hove Beach最厉害的魔术师，不可思议的Kleinman！
